pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, December 13, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a roundtable event on gender equality and women’s economic participation in honour of Kate McInturff. Minister of Status of Women Maryam Monsef, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Finance Bill Morneau and Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour, Patricia Hajdu will also participate.

Closed to media.

10:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Haiti Jean-Henry Céant.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

Media appearance

6:00 p.m. A live Toy Mountain Campaign event with the Prime Minister and Tom Brown will air on CTV Toronto.
